KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumVector compareEQ 014
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareEQ function to compare two Vectors and return the Boolean value, true or false. The values of each Vector are compared to determine whether the Vectors are equal or not.

Syntax.Note: The Vectors are not of the same type.
